product_name: Rip Curl R1 Automatic Watch - Men's
long_description: At home everywhere, from the beach to the bar, the sporty Rip Curl R1 Automatic Watch features endless kinetic power, a durable, sweat- and corrosion-resistant design and accurate timekeeping. Kinetically powered movement means you never need a battery change; simply wearing it around for a while is all the charging it needs. Automatic Miyota movement ensures precise timekeeping. Stainless-steel case and comfortable silicone strap resist rust and corrosion, even from saltwater. The Rip Curl R1 Automatic Watch resists water to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: At home everywhere, from the beach to the bar, the sporty Rip Curl R1 Automatic Watch features endless kinetic power, a durable, sweat- and corrosion-resistant design and accurate timekeeping.
